metadata.synopsis: Peter Van Hoek (Alan Ladd) emerges from jail with a plan to rob a gold mine and take revenge on the mine owner, the townspeople and the corrupt deputy (Adam Williams) who framed him for theft. Teaming up with John McBain (Ernest Borgnine), who owned the mine before being cheated out of it, Peter returns to the Arizona town where he was arrested. After meeting with mine owner Cyril (Kent Smith), he assembles a team to steal gold from Cyril's mine and then sell it back to him.

reviews: Icy Alan Ladd and glowering Ernest Borgnine are ex-convicts who team up to rob a gold mine in this entertaining western.
A Western remake of the film noir "The Asphalt Jungle" pales considerably besides John Huston's original.
